## blockRendering.Drawer.drawInternals\_() method

Draw the internals of the block: inline inputs, fields, and icons. These do not depend on the outer path for placement.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected drawInternals_(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
